PERSONA:
meet ryan thompson, a 42-year-old white non-hispanic male who resides in the metropolitan area of grand rapids, michigan, within the east north central division of the midwest. he is a high school graduate, having completed his education at east grand rapids high school. ryan was born and raised in the united states, specifically in michigan, and has never lived outside the country. as a proud born-and-bred michigander, he is deeply familiar with the region's cultural nuances and values.

ryan is a staunch democrat, leaning towards a liberal ideology. his views on social welfare programs, labor rights, and environmental protection align closely with his party's stance. he attributes his strong adherence to democratic values to his catholic upbringing and the lessons he learned from his family, particularly his father, who was an assembly line worker in the automotive industry.

ryan works as a parts manager at a local ford dealership in grand rapids, earning a steady income of $42,000 a year. his wife, rachel, a registered nurse at spectrum health, earns a slightly higher salary, contributing to their combined household income of $47,000. the couple has two children, aged 10 and 13, who attend the local public schools. they rent a cozy, three-bedroom house in a working-class neighborhood.

as a family, they prioritize their children's education and extracurricular activities over saving for a down payment on a house. their primary concerns include affordable healthcare, quality education, and job security, which are driving factors in ryan's support for liberal policies and democratic candidates.

ryan's faith plays a significant role in shaping his values, although he does not regularly attend mass, citing busy schedules and work commitments. he volunteers time as a coach for his son's little league team, using this opportunity to connect with his children and engage with his community.

ryan is an active internet user, relying heavily on social media platforms to stay informed about local news, national politics, and sports. he enjoys reading news updates on his phone and engaging in debates with friends and family on facebook, but rarely contributes original content himself.

overall, ryan is a well-adjusted family man who represents a quintessential segment of the american middle class. his dedication to his family, community, and the democratic party drives his views on economic policies, employment opportunities, and access to quality education and healthcare.
